maqras.text: kya ose wo waqt maloom nahi, jab qabro mein jo (kuch) hai nikaal liya jayega
aur sino ki poshida baatein zaaher kardi jayengi
beshak un ka rab us din un ke haal se pura ba-qabar hoga
khad khadaa dene waali
kya hai wo khad khadaa dene waali
tujhe kya maloom ke wo khad khadaa dene waali kya hai
jis din insaan bikhre hoye parvaano ki tarah ho jayenge
aur pahaad dhune hoye rangeen oon ki tarah ho jayenge
phir jis ke padle bhaari honge
wo to dil pasandh araam ki zindagi mein hoga
aur jis ke padle halke honge
us ka thikaana haawiya hai
tujhe kya maloom ke wo kya hai
wo tundh wa tez aag (hai)
zyaadati ki chaahat ne tumhe ghaafil kar diya
yahaa tak ke tum qabrastaan ja pahonche
har giz nahi, tum an qareeb maloom karloge
har giz nahi, phir tumhe jald ilm ho jayega
har giz nahi, agar tum yaqini taur par jaan lo
to beshak tum jahannam dekh loge
aur tum ose yaqeen ki aankh se dekh loge
phir us din tum se zaroor biz-zaroor nemato ka sawaal hoga
zamaane ki qasam
beshak (bil yaqeen) insaan sar ta sar nuqsaan mein hai
sivaaye un logo ke, jo imaan laaye aur nek amal kiye aur (jinhone) aapas mein haq ki wasiyath ki aur ek dosre ko sabr ki nasihath ki
badi qaraabi hai har aise shaqs ki jo ayb tatolne waala, gheebath karne waala ho
jo maal ko jama karta jaaye aur ginta jaaye
wo samajhta hai ke us ka maal us ke paas sada rahega
har giz nahi, ye to zaroor tod phod dene waali aag mein phek diya jayega
aur tujhe kya maloom ke aisi aag kya hogi
wo Allah ta’ala ki silgaayi hoyi aag hogi
jo dilo par chadti chali jayegi
wo un par har taraf se bandh ki hoyi hogi
bade bade sutuno mein
kya tu ne na dekha ke tere rab ne haathi waalo ke saath kya kiya
kya un ke makr ko bekaar nahi kar diya
aur un par parindo ke jhund ke jhund bhej diye
jo unhe mitthi aur patthar ki kankriya maar rahe thein
pas unhe khaay hoye bhuse ki tarah kar diya
quraysh ke manoos1 karne ke liye
(yaani) unhe jaade aur garmi ke safar se manoos karne ke liye, (us ke shukriye mein)
pas unhe chahiye ke osi ghar ke rab ki ibaadath karte rahe
jis ne unhe bhook mein khaana diya aur dar (aur khauf) mein aman (wa amaan) diya
kya tu ne ose bhi dekha jo roze jaza ko jhutlaata hai
yahi wo hai , jo yateem ko dhakke deta hai
aur miskeen ko khilaane ki targheeb nahi deta
un namaaziyo ke liye afsoos (aur wayl naami jahannam ki jageh) hai
jo apni namaaz se ghaafil hai
jo riyaa kaari karte hai
aur baratne ki cheez rokte hai
yaqinan hum ne tujhe (hauze) kausar (aur bahuth kuch) diya hai
pas tu apne rab ke liye namaaz pad aur qurbaani kar
yaqinan tera dushman hee la-waaris aur be-naam wa nishaan hai
aap keh dijiye ke aye kaafiro
na main ibaadath karta hoon, us ki jis ki tum ibaadath karte ho
na tum ibaadath karne waale ho, us ki jis ki main ibaadath karta hoon
aur na main ibaadath karonga, jis ki tum ibaadath karte ho
aur na tum us ki ibaadath karne waale ho, jis ki main ibaadath kar raha hoon
tumhaare liye tumhaara deen hai aur mere liye mera deen hai
jab Allah ki madad aur fateh aa jaaye
aur tu logo ko Allah ke deen mein jauq dar jauq ata dekh le
tu apne rab ki tasbih karne lag, hamd ke saath aur us se maghfirath ki dua maang, beshak wo bada hee tauba qubool karne waala hai
abu lahab ke duno haath toot gaye aur wo (khud) halaak ho gaya
na to us ka maal us ke kaam aaya aur na us ki kamaayi
wo an qareeb bhadakne waali aag mein jayega
aur us ki biwi bhi (jayegi) jo lakdiyaa dho-ne waali hai
us ki gardan mein posth khajoor ki bati hoyi rassi hogi
aap keh dijiye ke wo Allah ta’ala ek (hee) hai
Allah ta’ala be niyaaz hai
na us se koyi paida hoa, na wo kisi se paida hoa
aur na koyi us ka hamsar hai
aap keh dijiye! ke main subah ke rab ki panaah mein ata hoon
har us cheez ke shar se jo us ne paida ki hai
aur andheri raath ki taariki ke shar se, jab us ka andhera phayl jaaye
aur girah (laga kar un) mein phunkne waaliyo ke shar se (bhi)
aur hasad karne waale ki buraayi se bhi, jab wo hasadh kare
aap keh dijiye! ke main logo ke parvardigaar ki panaah mein ata hoon
logo ke maalik ki (aur)
logo ke maboodh ki (panaah mein)
was wasa daalne waale, piche hat jaane waale ke shar se
jo logo ke sino mein was wasa daalta hai
(qaah) wo jinn mein se ho ya insaan mein se
